trans-unit.source: Provides interaction with Windows event logs.
trans-unit.target: 提供与 Windows 事件日志的交互。

trans-unit.source: EventLog lets you access or customize Windows event logs, which record information about important software or hardware events.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志，可访问或自定义 Windows 事件日志，记录有关重要的软件或硬件事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Using EventLog, you can read from existing logs, write entries to logs, create or delete event sources, delete logs, and respond to log entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件日志，您可以从现有日志读取、 将条目写入到日志、 创建或删除事件源，删除日志，并响应日志条目。

trans-unit.source: You can also create new logs when creating an event source.
trans-unit.target: 创建事件源时，你还可以创建新的日志。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 完成后使用类型的操作后，你应释放类型直接或间接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，使用一种语言构造如`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: In addition to providing access to individual event logs and their entries, the EventLog class lets you access the collection of all event logs.
trans-unit.target: 除了提供对个人事件日志和它们的项的访问，EventLog 类使你可以访问的所有事件日志的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `static` members of EventLog to delete logs, get log lists, create or delete a source, or determine if a computer already contains a particular source.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`static`成员的事件日志以删除日志，获取日志列表、 创建或删除源，或确定是否计算机已包含一个特定的源。

trans-unit.source: There are three default event logs: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 有三个默认事件日志︰ 应用程序、 系统和安全。

trans-unit.source: A Security log is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 安全日志是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Other applications and services you install, such as Active Directory, might have additional event logs.
trans-unit.target: 其他应用程序和安装，如 Active Directory 的服务可能具有其他事件日志。

trans-unit.source: There are security considerations when using the EventLog class.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 EventLog 类时，有安全注意事项。

trans-unit.source: EventLog requires <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission> permissions for specific actions in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, or full trust in the .NET Framework 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志需要<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>的.NET Framework 2.0 和更高版本中的特定操作或在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 中的完全信任权限。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission> not be granted to partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>不授予给部分受信任的代码。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>

trans-unit.source: You should never pass any event log object, including <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry> objects, to less trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 你决不要将传递任何事件日志的对象，包括<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>对象，不太受信任的代码。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, creating an EventLog object, writing an entry, and then passing the EventLog object to partially trusted code can create a security issue, because the ability to read and write to the event log allows code to perform actions such as issuing event log messages in the name of another application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，创建一个事件日志的对象，写入条目，然后将事件日志到部分受信任的代码的对象可以创建安全问题，因为能够读取和写入事件日志允许代码执行操作，如发布事件日志消息，另一个应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the credentials of a user.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的凭据。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To run the code that accesses the Security log, you must first elevate your credentials from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的凭据从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by opening the shortcut menu for the application (if you're using a mouse, right-click the application icon) and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过打开应用程序的快捷菜单启动应用程序时可以执行此操作 （如果你使用鼠标，右键单击应用程序图标） 并指示你想要以管理员身份运行。

trans-unit.source: You can use EventLog to create custom event logs that you can view through the server's Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志可用于创建自定义你可以通过服务器的事件查看器查看的事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.RegisterDisplayName%2A> method to display a localized name for your event log in the Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.RegisterDisplayName%2A>方法以在事件查看器显示你的事件日志的本地化的名称。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.RegisterDisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A> method to configure the behavior of your event log when it reaches its maximum log size.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>方法来配置你的事件日志的行为，当它达到其最大日志大小。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: To read from an event log, specify the log name (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property) and server computer name (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> property for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 若要从事件日志中读取，指定日志名称 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>属性) 和服务器计算机名称 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>属性的事件日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify the server computer name, the local computer, ".", is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你未指定服务器的计算机名称，本地计算机，"。"，则假定。

trans-unit.source: It's not necessary to specify the event source (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property), because a source is required only for writing to logs.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定事件源 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>属性)，因为源是只有需要写入日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> property is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>属性自动填充的条目的事件日志的列表。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write to an event log, specify or create an event source (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 若要写入事件日志，请指定或创建事件源 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>属性)。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative credentials on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理凭据。

trans-unit.source: The event source registers your application with the event log as a valid source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 事件源将你的应用程序注册的有效项源作为事件日志。

trans-unit.source: You can use the event source to write to only one log at a time.
trans-unit.target: 事件源可用于写入一次只有一个日志。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property can be any random string, but the name must be distinct from other sources on the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>属性可以是任何随机字符串，但该名称必须是不同于计算机上的其他源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event source is typically the name of the application or another identifying string.
trans-unit.target: 事件源通常是应用程序或另一个标识字符串的名称。

trans-unit.source: Trying to create a duplicate <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> value throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试创建重复<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>值引发异常。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, a single event log can be associated with multiple sources.
trans-unit.target: 但是，单个事件日志可能与多个源。

trans-unit.source: If the event source for the event log associated with the EventLog instance doesn't exist, a new event source is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在与事件日志实例关联的事件日志的事件源，创建新的事件源。

trans-unit.source: To create an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative credentials.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的事件源在 Windows Vista 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理凭据。

trans-unit.source: This requirement is because all event logs, including Security logs, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: 此要求是因为必须搜索所有事件日志，包括安全日志，以确定事件源是否是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the Security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>引发。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Creating or deleting an event source requires synchronization of the underlying code by using a named mutex.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 创建或删除事件源需要通过使用命名的互斥体的基础代码的同步。

trans-unit.source: If a highly privileged application locks the named mutex, trying to create or delete an event source causes the application to stop responding until the lock is released.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有高特权的应用程序锁定命名互斥体，尝试创建或删除事件源将导致应用程序停止响应，直到该锁被释放。

trans-unit.source: To help prevent this problem, never grant <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> permission to untrusted code.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止此问题，永远不会授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>到不受信任的代码的权限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>

trans-unit.source: In addition, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> permission potentially allows other permissions to be bypassed and should only be granted to highly trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>权限可能允许绕开其他权限和仅应授予高度受信任的代码。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>

trans-unit.source: Applications and services should write to the Application log or to a custom log.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers should write to the System log.
trans-unit.target: 设备驱动程序应写入系统日志。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property, the event log defaults to the Application log.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>属性，则事件日志默认为应用程序日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is nothing to protect an application from writing as any registered source.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 无需进行任何以防止应用程序编写为任何已注册的源。

trans-unit.source: If an application is granted <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess> permission, it can write events for any valid source registered on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序被授予<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess>权限，它可以编写任何有效的源的计算机上注册的事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> methods to write events to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法来写入事件，以便将事件日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定事件源写入事件;你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system hasn't refreshed its list of event sources, and you try to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source by using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> object or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用配置新的源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>对象或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative credentials on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理凭据。

trans-unit.source: Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs.
trans-unit.target: 每个源可以一次; 写入只有一个事件日志但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可能需要为不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件配置的多个源。

trans-unit.source: To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建。

trans-unit.source: If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration instead of deleting the existing source.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他应用程序或组件使用的现有源，请使用更新的配置，而不是删除现有的源创建新的源。

trans-unit.source: You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以先使用本地化的资源注册事件源，为你的事件类别和消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Your application can write event log entries by using resource identifiers instead of specifying the actual string values.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序可以通过使用资源标识符而不指定的实际字符串值编写事件日志条目。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> classes for more information about configuring your source with resource files.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>有关的资源文件配置您的源的详细信息的类。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not have to set the resource file properties for the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值，你不需要设置源的文件属性的资源。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用该<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法使用在事件日志的资源标识符来编写条目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: When writing events, you must at least specify either a message string or the resource identifier for a message string.
trans-unit.target: 写入事件时，你必须至少指定一个消息字符串或消息字符串的资源标识符。

trans-unit.source: Other event properties are optional.
trans-unit.target: 其他事件属性都是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Examples of optional event settings include the following: - You can set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> to specify the icon that the Event Viewer displays for the entry.
trans-unit.target: 可选事件设置示例包括以下:-你可以设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>指定事件查看器显示的项的图标。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>

trans-unit.source: - You can specify a category identifier for the event, if your application uses categories for filtering the events.
trans-unit.target: -如果你的应用程序使用类别进行筛选的事件，你可以指定事件的类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: - You can attach binary data to your event entry if you want to associate additional information with a given event.
trans-unit.target: -如果你想要将其他信息与给定的事件相关联，你可以将二进制数据附加到事件项。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Event logging consumes disk space, processor time, and other system resources.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 事件日志记录占用磁盘空间、 处理器时间和其他系统资源。

trans-unit.source: It is important to log only essential information.
trans-unit.target: 请务必仅记录基本信息。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you place event log calls in an error path, rather than in the main code path, so they don't adversely affect performance.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议将事件日志调用放在错误路径中，而不是在主代码路径中，因此它们不会影响性能。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of EventLog, see the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的事件日志的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Does not associate the instance with any log.
trans-unit.target: 不将实例与任何日志关联。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance.
trans-unit.target: 之前调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>实例。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are only reading <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> from the log, you can alternatively specify only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果您仅读取<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>从日志中，您可以另行指定仅<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果不指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>已初始化。

trans-unit.source: Removes all entries from the event log.
trans-unit.target: 从事件日志中移除所有项。

trans-unit.source: Event logs are set with a maximum size that determines how many entries they can contain.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志设置最大大小，它确定它们可以包含的项数。

trans-unit.source: When an event log is full, it stops recording new event information or begins to overwrite earlier entries.
trans-unit.target: 当事件日志已满时，它将停止记录新的事件信息，或开始覆盖以前的项。

trans-unit.source: If event recording stops, you can use this method to clear the log of existing entries and allow it to start recording events again.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件录制停止后，你可以使用此方法要清除日志中的现有条目，并允许它重新开始记录事件。

trans-unit.source: You must have administrator permissions to the computer on which the log resides to clear event log entries.
trans-unit.target: 你必须具有到日志驻留以清除事件日志条目的计算机的管理员权限。

trans-unit.source: Clear closes the event log, releases the event handles, retrieves new read and write handles, and reopens the event log.
trans-unit.target: 清除关闭事件日志、 释放事件句柄，检索新读取和写入句柄，并重新打开事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Events received after the call to the method are not cleared along with the existing events.
trans-unit.target: 对方法的调用后收到的事件不会清除与现有的事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event log was not cleared successfully.
trans-unit.target: 不成功清除事件日志。

trans-unit.source: -or- The log cannot be opened.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法打开日志。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: Windows 错误代码不可用。

trans-unit.source: A value is not specified for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*> property.
trans-unit.target: 没有为指定值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*>

trans-unit.source: Make sure the log name is not an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 请确保日志名称不为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The log does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 日志不存在。

trans-unit.source: Closes the event log and releases read and write handles.
trans-unit.target: 关闭事件日志并释放读取和写入句柄。

trans-unit.source: The Close method is called by the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Close 方法调用的受保护<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to invoke Close before calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不需要调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>之前调用关闭

trans-unit.source: The event log's read handle or write handle was not released successfully.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志的读取句柄或写句柄不成功发布。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a valid event source for writing localized event messages, using the specified configuration properties for the event source and the corresponding event log.
trans-unit.target: 建立的有效事件源写入本地化的事件消息，为事件源和相应的事件日志中使用指定的配置属性。

trans-unit.source: The configuration properties for the event source and its target event log.
trans-unit.target: 为事件源及其目标事件日志的配置属性中。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: 无法打开事件日志的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: sourceData is .
trans-unit.target: sourceDatais .

trans-unit.source: Establishes the specified source name as a valid event source for writing entries to a log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的源名称为本地计算机上向日志写入项的有效事件源。

trans-unit.source: This method can also create a new custom log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还可以在本地计算机上创建一个新的自定义日志。

trans-unit.source: The source name by which the application is registered on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 依据应用程序注册本地计算机的源名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log the source's entries are written to.
trans-unit.target: 源的项写入到日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include Application, System, or a custom event log.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括应用程序、 系统或自定义的事件日志。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 无法在本地计算机上打开事件日志的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: Establishes the specified source name as a valid event source for writing entries to a log on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的源名称作为指定的计算机上向日志写入项的有效事件源。

trans-unit.source: This method can also be used to create a new custom log on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还可以用于指定计算机上创建一个新的自定义日志。

trans-unit.source: The source by which the application is registered on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 依据应用程序注册指定的计算机的源。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log the source's entries are written to.
trans-unit.target: 源的项写入到日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include Application, System, or a custom event log.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括应用程序、 系统或自定义的事件日志。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value, `logName` defaults to Application.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定一个值，`logName`默认为应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer to register this event source with, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 要注册，此事件源的计算机的名称或"。"本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 无法在指定的计算机上打开事件日志的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: Removes an event log from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 从本地计算机上移除事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when the log you want to delete is on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要删除的日志位于本地计算机上，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: You can delete any log on the computer, provided you have the appropriate registry permissions.
trans-unit.target: 你可以删除的计算机上，任何日志，前提是您具有适当的注册表权限。

trans-unit.source: Delete removes the log specified by `logName` from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 删除操作会移除指定的日志`logName`来自本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: If you want to delete only the source registered to a log, call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要删除仅注册到日志的源，调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you only want to delete the log entries, call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Clear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你只想要删除的日志条目，调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Clear%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Delete and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A> are `static` methods, so they can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: 删除和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>是`static`方法，以便它们可以调用在该类本身。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create a new instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call either method.
trans-unit.target: 不需要创建的新实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>调用任何一种方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The Delete method first deletes the file that holds the contents of the log.
trans-unit.target: Delete 方法会依次删除存储日志的内容的文件。

trans-unit.source: It then accesses the registry and removes all the event sources registered for that log.
trans-unit.target: 然后，访问注册表，并删除为该日志注册的所有事件源。

trans-unit.source: If you recreate the log at a later point, you should register the event sources again, if they are to be reused.
trans-unit.target: 如果重新创建在以后的日志时，你应该它们是否要重用再次注册事件源。

trans-unit.source: If you do not register the event sources and other users write to an event source without specifying a log name, the event source will be created in the Application event log.
trans-unit.target: 如果不注册事件源和其他用户的事件源编写无需指定日志名称，将在应用程序事件日志中创建事件源。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, applications that previously were able to write entries to the log you deleted and recreated will write to the Application log instead, because it now contains the event source.
trans-unit.target: 因此，应用程序以前曾经将条目写入到删除并重新创建的日志将写入到应用程序日志相反，因为它现在包含事件源。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Recreating an event log can be a difficult process.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 重新创建事件日志可以是一个复杂的过程。

trans-unit.source: Avoid deleting any of the system-created event logs, such as the Application log.
trans-unit.target: 避免删除任何系统创建事件日志，如应用程序日志。

trans-unit.source: Deleting a log through a call to Delete automatically deletes the sources registered to that log.
trans-unit.target: 删除通过删除调用日志将自动删除已注册到该日志的源。

trans-unit.source: This can make other applications using that log inoperative.
trans-unit.target: 这会使其他应用程序使用该日志不起作用。

trans-unit.target: DeleteEventSource 访问本地计算机上的注册表，并删除的应用程序作为有效的事件源注册。

trans-unit.source: You can remove your component as a valid source of events if you no longer need it to write entries to that log.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不再需要它来写入该日志条目，则可以删除你的组件作为有效的事件源。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might do this if you need to change your component from one log to another.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>引用。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> receives <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten"></xref> event notifications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>接收<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten"></xref>事件通知。

trans-unit.source: The EnableRaisingEvents property determines whether the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> raises events when entries are written to the log.
trans-unit.target: EnableRaisingEvents 属性确定是否<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>引发事件时条目写入日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: When the property is `true`, components that receive the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event will receive notification any time an entry is written to the log that is specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当该属性是`true`，接收组件<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>事件将收到通知任何时间在指定的日志中写入一项<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>

trans-unit.source: If EnableRaisingEvents is `false`, no events are raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果 EnableRaisingEvents `false`，会引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can receive event notifications only when entries are written on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 仅在本地计算机上写入项时，可以接收事件通知。

trans-unit.source: You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 无法接收在远程计算机上写入项的通知。

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 初始化发生在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>方法开始初始化。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>和 EndInit 方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 获取事件日志的内容。

trans-unit.source: Use the Entries member when reading from the event log.
trans-unit.target: 从事件日志中读取时，请使用的项成员。

trans-unit.source: Because the property is read-only, you cannot modify an entry or write to the log using Entries.
trans-unit.target: 因为该属性是只读的无法修改一个条目，或写入使用条目的日志。

trans-unit.source: Instead, specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> to write a new log entry.
trans-unit.target: 相反，指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>并调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>编写新的日志条目。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use Entries to count the number of entries in the event log, and view each <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用条目来计算事件日志中的项数，还可以查看每个<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>集合中。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>

trans-unit.source: Use the indexed <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A> member to retrieve information about a specific entry, such as <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Category%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EntryType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A>成员，如检索有关特定条目，信息<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Category%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A>，或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EntryType%2A>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EntryType%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Category%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> when only reading from a log.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>仅从日志读取</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> name and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> (server computer name) properties for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以仅指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>名称和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>（服务器计算机名称） 属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>实例。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the Entries member is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下，项成员自动填充的条目的事件日志的列表。

trans-unit.source: You can select the appropriate index for an item in this list to read individual entries.
trans-unit.target: 此列表以读取各个项中，可以选择适当的索引的项。

trans-unit.source: An important distinction between reading and writing log entries is that it is not necessary to explicitly call a read method.
trans-unit.target: 读取和写入日志项之间的一个重要区别在于不需要显式调用读取的方法。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> are specified, the Entries property is automatically populated.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>指定，自动填充项属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> property, the Entries property is repopulated the next time you read it.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>属性，属性重新填充读取它。 下一次的条目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You are not required to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> if you are connecting to a log.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不要求你指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如果你要连接到日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>, the local computer, ".", is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>，本地计算机，"。"，则假定。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection"></xref> holding the entries in the event log.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection"> </xref>保存事件日志中的条目。

trans-unit.source: Each entry is associated with an instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 每个项均与实例相关联<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an entry is written to an event log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在本地计算机上向事件日志写入一个条目时发生。

trans-unit.source: To get event notifications, you must set <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取事件通知，必须设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>到`true`。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can only receive event notifications when entries are written on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 只有在本地计算机上写入项时，只能接收事件通知。

trans-unit.source: You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 无法接收在远程计算机上写入项的通知。

trans-unit.source: When you create an EntryWritten delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 EntryWritten 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关与委托一起处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The system responds to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> only if the last write event occurred at least six seconds previously.
trans-unit.target: 系统响应<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>仅当最后一个写入事件发生至少为六秒以前。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implies you will only receive one EntryWritten event notification within a six-second interval, even if more than one event log change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着将仅收到一个&6; 秒间隔内的 EntryWritten 事件通知，即使多个事件日志更改发生该事件。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a sufficiently long sleep interval (around 10 seconds) between calls to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, you are less likely to miss an event.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入到的调用之间的足够长的休眠时间间隔 （大约为 10 秒钟） <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，你不太可能丢失事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if write events occur more frequently, you might not recieve the event notification until the next interval.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果更频繁地发生写入事件，你可能无法收到事件通知，直到下一个间隔。

trans-unit.source: Typically, missed event notifications are not lost, but delayed.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，丢失的事件通知将不丢失，而延迟。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the log exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 确定本地计算机上是否存在日志。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine if a log exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于确定本地计算机上是否存在日志。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a source exists on the local computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定本地计算机上是否存在的源，，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the local computer; otherwise, the query returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法访问注册表，你必须在本地计算机，则具有相应的注册表权限否则，查询将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new log the name of an existing log on the same computer, use this method before creating a new log to determine if the specified `logName` already exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 因为你无法在同一台计算机上为新的日志的现有的日志名称，使用此方法之前创建新的日志以确定是否指定`logName`本地计算机上已存在。

trans-unit.source: The `logName` parameter is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `logName`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Exists is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: 存在是`static`方法，使其可以调用类本身上。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call Exists.
trans-unit.target: 不需要创建的实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>调用 Exists。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The name of the log to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include: Application, Security, System, other application-specific logs (such as those associated with Active Directory), or any custom log on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括︰ 应用程序、 安全、 系统、 其他特定于应用程序日志 （如日志与 Active Directory 关联） 或在计算机上的任何自定义日志。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the log exists on the local computer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果日志存在于本地计算机，则上否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The logName is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or the value is empty.
trans-unit.target: LogName 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或值为空。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the log exists on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 确定该日志是否存在指定的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine if a log exists on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以确定远程计算机上是否存在日志。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a source exists on a remote computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定远程计算机上是否存在的源，，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the specified computer; otherwise, the query returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法访问注册表，你必须指定计算机上具有相应的注册表权限否则，查询将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new log the name of an existing log on the same computer, use this method before creating a new log to determine if one with the specified `logName` already exists on the server specified by the `machineName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 由于你无法在同一台计算机上为新的日志的现有的日志名称，使用此方法在创建新日志之前确定如果一个具有指定`logName`按指定的服务器上已存在`machineName`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `logName` and `machineName` parameters are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `logName`和`machineName`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>是`static`方法，使其可以调用类本身上。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create a new instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不需要创建的新实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>来调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The log for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索日志。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include: Application, Security, System, other application-specific logs (such as those associated with Active Directory), or any custom log on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括︰ 应用程序、 安全、 系统、 其他特定于应用程序日志 （如日志与 Active Directory 关联） 或在计算机上的任何自定义日志。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer on which to search for the log, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的日志，在其计算机的名称或"。"本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the log exists on the specified computer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该日志存在指定的计算机; 上否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The machineName parameter is an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: machineName 参数是无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have used proper syntax for the computer on which you are searching.
trans-unit.target: 请确保你具有用于在其要搜索的计算机的正确的语法。

trans-unit.source: -or- The logName is or the value is empty.
trans-unit.target: -或- logName 是或值为空。

trans-unit.source: Searches for all event logs on the local computer and creates an array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> objects that contain the list.
trans-unit.target: 搜索本地计算机上的所有事件日志并创建的数组<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>包含列表的对象。

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the local computer when the call to GetEventLogs is made.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>进行到 GetEventLogs 调用时，对象是本地计算机上的所有事件日志的快照。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time.
trans-unit.target: 这不是动态集合，因此它不反映的删除或创建的实时日志。

trans-unit.source: You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证数组中的日志存在之前读取或写入到它。

trans-unit.source: The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 数组通常包含至少三个日志︰ 应用程序、 系统和安全。

trans-unit.source: If you created custom logs on the local computer, they will appear in the array as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在本地计算机上创建自定义日志，则它们将显示以及数组中。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索事件日志的列表，你必须具有相应的注册表权限。

trans-unit.source: These permissions are identical to those required to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这些权限是与调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>所需的相同

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> that represents the logs on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"> </xref> ，表示本地计算机上的日志。

trans-unit.source: You do not have read access to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 你没有读取访问注册表。

trans-unit.source: -or- There is no event log service on the computer.

trans-unit.source: Searches for all event logs on the given computer and creates an array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> objects that contain the list.
trans-unit.target: 在给定计算机上的所有事件日志中都搜索和创建的数组<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>包含列表的对象。

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the computer specified by the `machineName` parameter when the call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> is made.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>对象是指定的计算机上的所有事件日志的快照`machineName`参数时对调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A>进行。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time.
trans-unit.target: 这不是动态集合，因此它不反映的删除或创建的实时日志。

trans-unit.source: You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证数组中的日志存在之前读取或写入到它。

trans-unit.source: The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 数组通常包含至少三个日志︰ 应用程序、 系统和安全。

trans-unit.source: If you created custom logs on the specified computer, they will appear in the array as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的计算机上创建自定义日志，则它们将显示以及数组中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A>是`static`方法，使其可以调用上<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>类本身。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create an instance of an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object to make a call to the method.
trans-unit.target: 不需要创建的实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>要使其对方法的调用对象。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索事件日志的列表，你必须具有相应的注册表权限。

trans-unit.source: These permissions are identical to those required to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
